reviews.title: Best game ever!
reviews.comment: Only one challenge after last update my chat vanished. Tried to remove and reinstall but still doesn\'t work. Please fix.
reviews.author: Brian Dunn

reviews.title: lost the ability to chat please fix now
reviews.comment: The game is cool except I lost my ability to chat. This must be fixed soon as it is annoying not as much fun when you can\'t say what you want to your buddy
reviews.author: Joe Giansante

reviews.title: Broken app or unfinished
reviews.comment: Still have NOT FIXED the free chips problem.  If you want more than 1 star fix the free chip offers since none of the links work (open). The missing currency link doesn\'t even work... chat is broken too now
reviews.author: Jonathan Samet

reviews.title: Shuffle up and deal!!!!
reviews.comment: Hands down the best poker app out there..... You can play Texas Hold\'em or Omaha.  Ring games or play for a Braclet or Ring.... Awesome Awesome Awesome!!
reviews.author: Scott Pepper

reviews.comment: Pretty good poker game, I haven\'t had any glitch problems yet.
reviews.author: Aaron McMillen

reviews.title: Good Fun game.
reviews.comment: Fun game. Some things could be better but nothing major. Overall a good game.
reviews.author: Justena Olin

reviews.comment: This game is exellent,with one exception. You took away the ability to chat,which is the reason I enjoy it so much. Not being able to communicate with other player takes away fron the enjoyment. This was my way of entertainment and woould really appreciate it if you corrected this PROBLEM. If you look at my account activity since the change, I have been less active because of it. Please reconsider letting us chat with our friends. Otherwise,its just another game
reviews.author: Vivtor Baez

reviews.title: Is good
reviews.comment: I can\'t chat any more and have bought chips and didn\'t receive them can u fix that plz
reviews.author: Brian Gilkison

reviews.title: jd baird
reviews.comment: Very good game. Very real& good speed. . No substitute for this.
reviews.author: ,John Baird

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Perfect for both pro and novice poker players.
reviews.author: Arthur Poland

reviews.title: The Best!!! :-)
reviews.comment: My all-time favorite. The Best of the best, above all the others to be sure.
reviews.author: Nancy Cotanay

reviews.title: almost the greatest!
reviews.comment: greatesf poker game untIl the chat feature vanIshed! please fIx It!
reviews.author: edward bradley

reviews.title: Game is fun but needs repair
reviews.comment: I had a flush but yet a 2pair beat me... and that happened more than once also I tried to make a purchase and it went thru but I didnt get the credits. Wow
reviews.author: Kolten Churchwell

reviews.title: New update crashes
reviews.comment: Got the update and my app just freezes and crashes upon launch. Reinstalled twice. Not good.
reviews.author: BJ Corey

reviews.title: Wow.  :-)
reviews.comment: The best game I ever played when it come to poker
reviews.author: Shaberia Crowder

reviews.title: Absolutely the best poker AP hands down.
reviews.comment: Nothing even comes close.
reviews.author: Joe Naso

reviews.title: Just Love ut
reviews.comment: This is the best poker game out here.
reviews.author: Jason Doehring

reviews.title: Good poker!
reviews.comment: Poker in the rear, liquor in the front! that\'s how it\'s done
reviews.author: Louis Mancuso

reviews.title: Can\'t get on.....
reviews.comment: Just now started saying oops error... Issue1 please fix!was best game on apps
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Customer support is seemingly non-existent. Try getting in contact with someone who can help with not getting credit for purchases. Good luck.
reviews.author: Roger Allen Burns
